BlackStorm:

Blackstorm sat down in atop of a mountain, if a maxi's arrived she 
would see him or her there. she felt in silence and tought alot 
about was happening the last few days... What if it was true, what 
Hev had said... Why did she like to remember, but a strong fear made 
her didn't like to know who was she... how was her life with maxis?



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 5/7/03 7:04:55 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > "I'm not leaving this are, MAxima"replied the femme "I'm still 
> > here... Watching..."
> > 
> > 
> 
> Maxima just smirked. 
> 
> Then went back to rumaging through the various materials. It was 
like a 
> treasure trove in here. the materials she recognised. "Hehe... I 
feel so 
> old," she stated. 
> 
> After taking an inventory, she left the hold & returned to the 
main 
> command-control room/bridge. Glancing about, the place looked like 
a wreck.. 
> which it was. She, however, could not touch nor move anyone. As 
much as she 
> would love to. Leaving her comrades in such a horrid state... just 
bothered 
> her. They needed more respect than this. But... alas, she 
couldn't. 
> 
> She just.. busied herself around the Ark, making sure things that 
needed to 
> be operational for now was operational.
